metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for interoperability between coding agents like Claude Code and Codex CLI

plugins.name: interdoc
plugins.description: Recursive AGENTS.md generator with CLAUDE.md harmonization, incremental updates, diff previews, and smart monorepo scoping. Cross-AI compatible.

plugins.name: tldr-swinton
plugins.description: Token-efficient code reconnaissance for LLMs. Up to 84% token savings with semantic search, diff-context, symbol analysis, and delta-first extraction for multi-turn conversations.

plugins.name: tuivision
plugins.description: TUI automation and visual testing - Playwright for terminal applications. Spawn, interact with, and screenshot TUI apps via MCP.

plugins.name: tool-time
plugins.description: Tool usage analytics for Claude Code and Codex CLI. Tracks tool patterns via hooks, detects inefficiencies, and offers opt-in community comparison with anonymized data.

plugins.name: gurgeh-plugin
plugins.description: Codebase-aware Tier 1 review agents for Autarch (Go/Bubble Tea). Specialists: architecture, UX, code quality, performance, security, Bubble Tea v1, Gurgeh specs.

plugins.name: clavain
plugins.description: General-purpose engineering discipline plugin. 23 agents, 25 commands, 35 skills, 2 MCP servers — combining workflow discipline with specialized execution agents. Includes Codex dispatch, cross-AI review (interpeer, prompterpeer, winterpeer, splinterpeer), structured debate, and codex-first mode.

plugins.name: auracoil
plugins.description: GPT 5.2 Pro reviewer for AGENTS.md — accretive cross-AI documentation enhancement via Oracle
